name: Hilton Garden Inn Providence Airport/Warwick

reviews.text: Good for business travel. Staff was very helpful. Big rooms, quiet when I was there. There aren't any attractions/stores etc within walking distance, but there is a mall within a short drive. I researched and found that most of the other hotels in the area are also driving distance from stores and restaurants (can't sneak out for a quick cheap fast food snack, if that's what you're interested in). Great stay overall.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

likes.disliked: — Not walking distance to stores and restaurants

reviews.text: This is a new looking hotel, but the atmosphere is cold and the people are unfriendly. I am sure that the hotel is okay for some people, but I certainly did not enjoy myself and I would not return unless this was the last hotel with rooms. The rooms and the restaurant are average, the location is good. It seems like every Hilton I stay at is exactly the same. In summary, the hotel is very boring and unorginal. The biggest problem I had with my stay is the fact that I did not feel welcome.
reviews.title: Okay

reviews.text: We booked this property because of its proximity to the airport, and we just wanted a good night's sleep.
reviews.title: Not worth the price

reviews.text: The bedding was dubious quality, certainly not one might expect from a Hilton Garden Inn.
reviews.title: Great for business, New Hotel

reviews.text: You will get cheap, lumpy foam pillows that should have been tossed months ago. You will get a thin, polyster blanket, not a duvet, as one might expect.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: I love this hotel because it's new and the hospitality from the front desk to the servers in the restaurant are phenomenal. The rooms are clean, the free internet access is easy, close to tons of good restaurant chains and only 3 exits away from ridiculous shopping!! If you don't want to stay in providence bc it's too expensive, I think you'd be happy with this hotel. It's yet to establish businesses in its immediate area, but don't fret, you'll love the hotel.
reviews.title: Love the Warwick Hilton Garden Inn

likes.liked: — clean smell of hilton brand hotels

reviews.text: The Hilton Garden Inn is a great place to stay when catching an early flight out of TF Green airport. They have onsite parking, FREE wireless internet, 24 hour FREE business center, and FREE printing from your hotel room to the business center! They also have cookies at the front desk. My room was really nice and had a microwave and a refrigerator. I did not get a chance to have breakfast at the hotel as my flight was really early.
reviews.title: Great Hotel for business travelers

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Providence Airport/Warwick Hotel
